summary: This document is an email chain from July 24, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's medical care at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It discusses a request to ensure Epstein, who is on Psychological Observation, receives his prescribed constipation medication (docusate sodium/Colace).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the email chain who is on Psychological Observation at MCC New York and reported not receiving his constipation medication.

events.title: Medical Request for Inmate Epstein
events.description: An email chain discusses ensuring inmate Jeffrey Epstein receives his prescribed constipation medication while he is on Psychological Observation at MCC New York.

events.title: Epstein's Medication Filled
events.description: Epstein's prescription for docusate sodium 100mg (Colace) was filled for a 30-day supply.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated July 24, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was on Psychological Observation status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Epstein reported not receiving his prescribed constipation medication (docusate sodium/Colace).
His medication had been filled for a 30-day supply on July 12, 2019.
The correspondence involves a U.S. Public Health Service Chief Pharmacist at MCC New York.
